PolymorphicSubVI Properties

Requires: VI Scripting

Inherits from Node»SubVI. View the class hierarchy.

PropertyDescription
AutomaticSets or returns if the polymorphic VI automatically selects the instance. Details
Polymorphic VIReturns a reference to the Polymorphic VI that the subVI references. Details
Selected TypeSpecifies the polymorphic VI instance to select. Writing to this property removes automatic selection. Details
SelectorReturns a reference to the polymorphic VI selector for a polymorphic VI. Details
Selector VisibleSets or returns if the polymorphic VI selector is visible. Details
